verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> that came unto Hosea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Beeri <WH882>, in the days <WH3117> of Uzziah <WH5818>, Jotham <WH3147>, Ahaz <WH271>, and Hezekiah <WH3169>, kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and in the days <WH3117> of Jeroboam <WH3379> the son <WH1121> of Joash <WH3101>, king <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478>.

And she conceived again <WH2029>, and bare <WH3205> a daughter <WH1323>. And Jehovah said <WH559> unto him <WH7121>, Call her name <WH8034> Lo-ruhamah <WH3819>; for I will no more <WH3254> have mercy <WH7355> upon the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, that I should <WH5375> in any wise pardon them <WH5375>.

Now when she had weaned <WH1580> Lo-ruhamah <WH3819>, she conceived <WH2029>, and bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121>.
And Jehovah said <WH559>, Call <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Lo-ammi <WH3818>; for ye are not my people <WH5971>, and I will not be your God.

Yet the number <WH4557> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall be as the sand <WH2344> of the sea <WH3220>, which cannot be measured <WH4058> nor numbered <WH5608>; and it shall come to pass that <WH4725>, in the place where it was said <WH559> unto them <WH5971>, Ye are not my people, it shall be said <WH559> unto them <WH1121>, Ye are the sons of the living <WH2416> God <WH410>.

And the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall be gathered <WH6908> together <WH3162>, and they shall appoint <WH7760> themselves one <WH259> head <WH7218>, and shall go up <WH5927> from the land <WH776>; for great <WH1419> shall be the day <WH3117> of Jezreel <WH3157>.
